Uses of Class
com.hazelcast.config.NetworkConfig

Packages that use NetworkConfig
Package Description
com.hazelcast.config
Provides classes for configuring HazelcastInstance.

  • Uses of NetworkConfig in com.hazelcast.config

    Subclasses of NetworkConfig in com.hazelcast.config
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  AdvancedNetworkConfig.MemberNetworkingView
    Member endpoint decorated as a NetworkConfig Facade used during bootstrap to hide if-logic between the two networking configuration approaches
